rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with a modern open design featuring minimalistic finishes and ample natural light.
Spacious living room adjoining the entrance, designed for social interactions with floor-to-ceiling windows capturing western sunlight.
Integrated dining area adjacent to the living room, featuring a modern layout and ample space for furniture.
Functional kitchen with an island counter, efficient storage solutions, and ventilation optimized per Vastu principles (preferably East or North)

features.name: ventilation_system
features.details: northward window placements for optimal air flow

rooms.description: Modern 4BHK townhouse includes four bedrooms. Bedroom 1 features a spacious balcony, designed with floor-to-ceiling windows to ensure maximum ventilation and daylight.
Second bedroom with a private balcony, offering a serene view and ample space for relaxation.
Third bedroom with a dedicated balcony designed for privacy and additional outdoor space.
Fourth bedroom with a spacious balcony, ensuring each occupant has their own outdoor space.
Primary bathroom for the ground floor, designed with modern fixtures and efficient water management.
Dedicated utility area for storage of cleaning supplies and maintenance equipment, ensuring clutter-free common areas.

openings.name: main_windows
openings.description: Multiple floor-to-ceiling windows strategically placed to capture sunlight and provide natural ventilation, particularly oriented towards the west.

vastu_compliance.balcony_design: spacious and private for each bedroom

rooms.description: First bedroom on the upper floor with a spacious balcony and floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring ample natural light.
Second bedroom with a private balcony designed to provide a quiet retreat.
Third bedroom featuring a balcony and modern design elements.
Fourth bedroom with a spacious balcony and modern design, ensuring comfort and style.
Secondary bathroom on the upper floor for guest or family use.

openings.name: balcony_windows
openings.description: Each bedroom features its own set of floor-to-ceiling windows integrated into the balcony design.
